notes: less common than "davanti a" in modern usage
example_sentence_english: He stopped in front of me.
We are in front of the gate.
There is a crowd in front of the stadium.
Leave the package in front of the entrance.
We will meet in front of the church.
Park in front of the shops.

example_sentence_italian: C'è una panchina avanti agli alberi.
example_sentence_english: There is a bench in front of the trees.

example_sentence_italian: La fermata è avanti alle scuole.
example_sentence_english: The stop is in front of the schools.
